desc: Shop with us online or visit our store located at 280 E. Rowland St., Covina, CA 91723. We are your home provider of Ifa, spiritual, meditative, and self-care products and services. We sell candles, crystals, oils, fragrance sprays, smudges, spiritual waters, incense, and more.

layout.text: Rush of Ase (ah-shay) is a small family owned business located in Covina, Ca. We are your home provider of Ifa, spiritual, meditative, and self-care items and services. Our store model is rooted in the Ifa African tradition of community building. We strive to assist individuals in becoming the best version of themselves, so that they can in turn support the upward growth of society. We sell Ifa traditional items, plants, herbs, candles, crystals, oils, fragrance sprays, smudges, spiritual waters, incense, and more. We offer beaded and stone jewelry customizations and repairs, as well as plant potting services. We accept bulk orders of plants, smudges, incense, stone bracelets, and traditional African items imported from Oyo State, Nigeria. Shop with us in store at 280 E. Rowland St., Covina, CA 91723 or online at rushofase.com.
